<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the 
foregoing, if &#147;C&#148; (as defined above) is equal to or greater than 
&#147;SP</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:1.0pt;">0</font>&#148; (as defined above), in 
lieu of the foregoing increase, each Holder of a Security shall receive, for 
each $1,000 principal amount of Securities, at the same time and upon the same 
terms as holders of the Common Shares, the amount of cash such Holder would have
received as if such Holder owned a number of Common Shares equal to the 
Conversion Rate in effect immediately prior to the open of business on the Ex 
Date for such cash dividend or distribution.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In no event shall the 
Conversion Rate be decreased pursuant to this <b>Section</b></font><b><font 
size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.05(D)</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(E)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If the Company or any of its 
Subsidiaries makes a payment in respect of a tender offer or exchange offer for 
the Common Shares, to the extent that the cash and value of any other 
consideration included in the payment per Common Share exceeds the average of 
the Closing Sale Prices of the Common Shares over the ten (10)&nbsp;consecutive 
Trading-Day period commencing on, and including, the Trading Day next succeeding
the last date on which tenders or exchanges may be made pursuant to such tender 
or exchange offer, the Conversion Rate shall be increased based on the following
formula:</p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="231" height="75" 
src="g161011mo15i006.gif"></font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">where</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 110.5pt;text-indent:-
74.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">CR</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:1.0pt;">0</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>=<font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the Conversion Rate in effect 
immediately prior to the close of business on the last Trading Day of the ten 
(10)&nbsp;consecutive Trading Day period commencing on, and including, the 
Trading Day next succeeding the date such tender or exchange offer expires;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 110.5pt;text-indent:-
74.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">CR'</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160; </font>=<font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the Conversion Rate in effect 
immediately after the close of business on the last Trading Day of the ten 
(10)&nbsp;consecutive Trading Day period commencing on, and including, the 
Trading Day next succeeding the date such tender or exchange offer expires;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 110.5pt;text-indent:-
74.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">AC</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>=<font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the aggregate value of all cash 
and any other consideration (as determined by the Board of Directors) paid or 
payable for Common Shares purchased in such tender or exchange offer;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 110.5pt;text-indent:-
74.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">OS</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:1.0pt;">0</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font>=<font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the number of Common Shares 
outstanding immediately prior to the date and time such tender or exchange offer
expires (prior to giving effect to the purchase or exchange of all shares 
accepted for purchase or exchange in such tender offer or exchange offer);</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 110.15pt;text-indent:-
74.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">OS'</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>=<font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the number of Common Shares 
outstanding immediately after the date and time such tender or exchange offer 
expires (after giving effect to the purchase or exchange of all shares accepted 
for purchase or exchange in such tender or exchange offer); and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">67<a name="PB_67_224222_141"></a></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='67',FILE='C:\JMS\107541\16-16101-1\task8049633\16101-1-mo-
15.htm',USER='107541',CD='Aug  4 03:24 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 110.15pt;text-indent:-
74.15pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">SP'</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>=<font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the average of the Closing Sale 
Prices of the Common Shares over the ten (10)&nbsp;consecutive Trading Day 
period commencing on, and including, the Trading Day next succeeding the date 
such tender or exchange offer expires.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The increase to the Conversion Rate under 
this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05(E)</b>&nbsp;shall occur at the close of business on 
the tenth (10th) Trading Day immediately following, but excluding, the date such
tender or exchange offer expires; <i>provided </i>that, (x)&nbsp;in respect of 
any conversion of Securities for which physical settlement is applicable, if the
relevant Conversion Date occurs during the ten (10)&nbsp;Trading Days 
immediately following, but excluding, the date that any such tender or exchange 
offer expires, references in this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05(E)</b>&nbsp;to ten 
(10)&nbsp;Trading Days shall be deemed replaced, solely in respect of that 
conversion, with such lesser number of consecutive Trading Days as have elapsed 
between the date that such tender or exchange offer expires and the Conversion 
Date for such conversion and (y)&nbsp;in respect of any conversion of Securities
for which cash settlement or combination settlement is applicable, for any 
trading day that falls within the relevant observation period for such 
conversion and within the ten (10)&nbsp;Trading Days immediately following, but 
excluding, the date that any such tender or exchange offer expires, references 
within this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05(E)</b>&nbsp;to ten (10)&nbsp;consecutive 
Trading Days shall be deemed replaced, solely in respect of that conversion with
such lesser number of Trading Days as have elapsed between the expiration date 
of such tender or exchange offer and such trading day in determining the 
conversion rate as of such Trading Day. In no event shall the Conversion Rate be
decreased pursuant to this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05(E)</b>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(F)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding anything to
the contrary herein, the Company may delay the settlement of any conversion of 
the Securities only to the extent necessary to calculate the amount of 
consideration due upon conversion in connection with any adjustment to the 
Conversion Rate set forth in this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b>. In addition, 
notwithstanding this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05&nbsp;</b>or any other provision of 
this Indenture or the Securities, if a Conversion Rate adjustment becomes 
effective on any Ex Date, and a Holder that has converted its Securities on or 
after such Ex Date and on or prior to the related Record Date would be treated
as the record holder of Common Shares as of the related Conversion Date as 
described under <b>Section&nbsp;10.02</b> based on an adjusted Conversion Rate 
for such Ex Date, then, notwithstanding the Conversion Rate adjustment 
provisions in this <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b>, the Conversion Rate adjustment 
relating to such Ex Date shall not be made for such converting Holder. Instead, 
such Holder shall be treated as if such Holder were the record owner of the 
Common Shares on an unadjusted basis and participate, following conversion, as a
holder of Common Shares, in the related dividend, distribution or other event 
giving rise to such adjustment.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(G)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>In addition to the foregoing 
adjustments in <b>subsections (A)</b>, <b>(B)</b>, <b>(C)</b>, 
<b>(D)</b>&nbsp;and<b>&nbsp;(E)</b>&nbsp;of this 
<b>Section&nbsp;</b><b>10.05</b>, the Company may, from time to time and to the 
extent permitted by law and the continued listing requirements of the NYSE MKT 
and the TSX (or if Common Shares are not listed on the NYSE MKT or the TSX, on 
such other exchange or market on which Common Shares are then listed or admitted
for trading), increase the Conversion Rate by any amount for a period of at 
least twenty (20) Business Days or any longer period as may be permitted or 
required by law, if the Board of Directors has made a determination, which 
determination shall be conclusive, that such</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">68<a name="PB_68_224240_7608"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">increase would be in the best 
interests of the Company. Such Conversion Rate increase shall be irrevocable 
during such period. The Company shall give notice to the Trustee and cause 
notice of such increase to be given to each Holder of Securities in accordance 
with </font><b>Section</b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;">&nbsp;</font><b>11.02</b>, at least fifteen (15) days prior to the
date on which such increase commences.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(H)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any increases in the Conversion Rate as 
determined by the Board of Directors pursuant to 
<b>Section&nbsp;10.05(G)</b>&nbsp;shall not, without the approval of the 
Company&#146;s shareholders, if required by the listing standards or 
rules&nbsp;of the NYSE MKT or the listing standards or rules&nbsp;of the TSX (or
if Common Shares are not listed on the NYSE MKT or the TSX, on such other 
national or regional exchange or market on which Common Shares are then listed 
or quoted), result in the issuance of 20% or more of the Common Shares or the
voting power, in the case of the NYSE MKT, the sale or issuance of 25% or more 
of the Common Shares or the voting power, in the case of the TSX, and the 
highest percentage permitted under applicable listing rules&nbsp;in the case of 
such other national or regional exchange or market on which Common Shares are 
then listed or admitted for trading), in each case, outstanding on the date 
hereof.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(I)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All 
calculations under this <b>Article</b><b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>X</b> shall be made to the 
nearest cent or to the nearest one-millionth of a share, as the case may be. 
Adjustments to the Conversion Rate will be calculated to the nearest 
1/10,000th&#160; per $1,000 principal amount of Securities.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.06</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>NO ADJUSTMENT</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything herein or in the 
Securities to the contrary, in no event shall the Conversion Rate be 
adjusted:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(A)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>upon the issuance of any Common Shares 
pursuant to any present or future plan providing for the reinvestment of 
dividends or interest payable on the Company&#146;s securities;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(B)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>upon the issuance of any Common Shares 
or restricted stock, restricted stock units, non-qualified stock options, 
incentive stock options or any other options, rights or other derivatives 
(including stock appreciation rights, deferred share units and performance share
units) to purchase Common Shares pursuant to any present or future employee, 
director or consultant benefit plan or program of, or assumed by, the Company or
any of the Subsidiaries;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(C)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>upon the issuance of any Common Shares
pursuant to any option, warrant, right or exercisable, exchangeable or 
convertible security not described in <b>Section&nbsp;10.06(B)</b>&nbsp;above 
and outstanding as of the date the Securities were first issued hereunder;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(D)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>for accrued and unpaid interest, if 
any, including Additional Amounts, if any;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(E)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>upon the repurchase of any Common
Shares pursuant to an open-market share repurchase program or other buy-back 
transaction that is not a tender offer or exchange offer of the nature described
in <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b>; or</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(F)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>for a change in the par 
value of Common Shares.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No adjustment in the 
Conversion Rate pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b> shall be required until 
cumulative adjustments are equal to at least one percent (1%) of the Conversion 
Rate as last adjusted (or, if never adjusted, the initial Conversion Rate); 
<i>provided, however,</i> that any such adjustments to the Conversion Rate which
by reason of this <b>Section</b></font><b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.06</b> would result in 
less than a one percent (1%) change in the effective Conversion Rate are not 
required to be made shall be carried forward and taken into account in any 
subsequent adjustment to the Conversion Rate;<i> provided further, </i>that any 
such adjustment of less than one percent (1%) that has not been made shall be 
made upon the occurrence of (i)&nbsp;the effective date for any Make-Whole 
Fundamental Change and (ii)&nbsp;a Redemption Date;<i> provided further</i>, 
that if the Company shall provide a notice of Redemption pursuant to 
<b>Section&nbsp;3.04</b>, or if a Fundamental Change or Make-Whole Fundamental 
Change occurs<b>,</b> then, in each case, any adjustments to the Conversion Rate
that have been, and at such time remain, deferred pursuant to this 
<b>Section</b><b><font size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.06</b> shall be given effect, and such 
adjustments, if any, shall no longer be carried forward and taken into account 
in any subsequent adjustment to the Conversion Rate.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If any rights, options or warrants issued 
by the Company and requiring an adjustment to the Conversion Rate in accordance 
with <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b> are only exercisable upon the occurrence of 
certain triggering events, then the Conversion Rate will not be adjusted as 
provided in <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b> until the earliest of such triggering 
event occurs. Upon the expiration or termination of any such rights, options or 
warrants without the exercise of such rights, options or warrants, the 
Conversion Rate then in effect shall be adjusted immediately to the Conversion 
Rate that would have been in effect at the time of such expiration or 
termination had such rights, options or warrants, to the extent outstanding 
immediately prior to such expiration or termination, never been 
issued.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If any dividend or distribution is declared
and the Conversion Rate is adjusted pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b> on 
account of such dividend or distribution, but such dividend or distribution is 
thereafter not paid or made, the Conversion Rate shall again be adjusted to the 
Conversion Rate which would then be in effect had such dividend or distribution 
not been declared.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No adjustment to the Conversion Rate need 
be made pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;10.05</b> for a transaction if Holders are 
to participate in the transaction without conversion on a basis and with notice 
that the Board of Directors determines in good faith to be fair and appropriate 
in light of the basis and notice on which holders of Common Shares participate 
in the transaction (which determination shall be described in a Board 
Resolution).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.07</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>OTHER ADJUSTMENTS</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that, as a result of an 
adjustment made pursuant to this <b>Article&nbsp;X</b>, the Holder of any 
Security thereafter surrendered for conversion shall become entitled to receive 
any Share Capital other than Common Shares, thereafter the Conversion Rate of 
such other shares so</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">70<a name="PB_70_224705_2530"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='70',FILE='C:\JMS\107541\16-16101-1\task8049706\16101-1-mo-
17.htm',USER='107541',CD='Aug  4 03:47 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">receivable upon conversion of any Security 
shall be subject to adjustment from time to time in a manner and on terms as 
nearly equivalent as practicable to the provisions with respect to Common Share 
contained in this <b>Article</b></font><b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>X</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.08</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>ADJUSTMENTS FOR TAX PURPOSES</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as prohibited 
by law or by the rules&nbsp;of the NYSE MKT or the TSX, the Company may make 
such increases in the Conversion Rate, in addition to those required by 
<b>Section</b></font><b><font size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.05</b> hereof, as it determines to be 
advisable in order that any stock dividend, subdivision of shares, distribution 
of rights to purchase stock or securities or distribution of securities 
convertible into or exchangeable for stock made by the Company or to its 
shareholders will not be taxable to the recipients thereof.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.09</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>NOTICE OF ADJUSTMENT</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Whenever the Conversion Rate is adjusted, 
the Company shall promptly provide to Holders notice of the adjustment and file 
with the Trustee an Officer&#146;s Certificate briefly stating the facts 
requiring the adjustment and the manner of computing it. The Officer&#146;s 
Certificate and notice to the Holders shall be conclusive evidence of the 
correctness of such adjustment.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.10</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>NOTICE OF CERTAIN TRANSACTIONS</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the Company takes any
action, or becomes aware of any event, that would require an adjustment in the 
Conversion Rate;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the Company takes any 
action that would require a supplemental indenture pursuant to 
<b>Section</b><b><font size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.11</b>; or</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>there is a dissolution or 
liquidation of the Company;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the Company shall provide Holders and the 
Trustee with a notice stating the proposed record, effective or expiration date,
as the case may be, of any transaction referred to in <b>clause (1)</b>, 
<b>(2)</b>&nbsp;or <b>(3)</b>&nbsp;of this <b>Section</b></font><b><font 
size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.10</b>. The Company shall provide such 
notice at least twenty (20) days before such date; however, failure to provide 
such notice or any defect therein shall not affect the validity of any 
transaction referred to in <b>clause (1)</b>, <b>(2)</b>&nbsp;or 
<b>(3)</b>&nbsp;of this <b>Section</b><b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.10</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.11</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>EFFECT OF RECLASSIFICATIONS, 
CONSOLIDATIONS, MERGERS, BINDING SHARE EXCHANGES OR SALES ON CONVERSION 
PRIVILEGE</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If any of the following shall occur, 
namely: (i)&nbsp;any reclassification or change in the Common Shares issuable 
upon conversion of Securities (other than a change in par value, or from par 
value to no par value, or from no par value to par value, or as a result of a 
subdivision or combination of Common Shares), (ii)&nbsp;any consolidation, 
amalgamation, statutory arrangement, merger or binding share exchange involving 
a third party in which the Company is not the surviving party or (iii)&nbsp;any 
sale, assignment, transfer, lease, conveyance or other disposition of all or 
substantially all of the Company&#146;s property or assets, in each case 
pursuant</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">71<a name="PB_71_224731_7056"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='71',FILE='C:\JMS\107541\16-16101-1\task8049706\16101-1-mo-
17.htm',USER='107541',CD='Aug  4 03:47 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">to which the Common Shares would be converted into or 
exchanged for, or would constitute solely the right to receive, cash, securities
or other property, then the Company or such successor or purchasing Person or 
Persons, as the case may be, shall, as a condition precedent to such 
reclassification, change, consolidation, amalgamation, statutory arrangement, 
merger, binding share exchange, sale, assignment, transfer, lease, conveyance or
disposition, execute and deliver to the Trustee a supplemental indenture in form
reasonably satisfactory to the Trustee providing that, at and after the 
effective time of such reclassification, change, consolidation, amalgamation, 
statutory arrangement, merger, binding share exchange, sale, assignment, 
transfer, lease, conveyance or disposition, the Holder of each Security then 
outstanding shall have the right to convert such Security into the kind and 
amount of cash, securities or other property (collectively, &#147;<b>Reference 
Property</b>&#148;), together with any applicable Conversion Make-Whole Payment,
receivable upon such reclassification, change, consolidation, amalgamation, 
statutory arrangement, merger, binding share exchange, sale, assignment, 
transfer, lease, conveyance or disposition by a holder of a number of Common 
Shares equal to a fraction whose denominator is one thousand (1,000) and whose 
numerator is the product of the principal amount of such Security and the 
Conversion Rate in effect immediately prior to such reclassification, change, 
consolidation, merger, binding share exchange, sale, transfer, lease, conveyance
or disposition (assuming, if holders of Common Shares shall have the opportunity
to elect the form of consideration to be received pursuant to such 
reclassification, change, consolidation, merger, binding share exchange, sale, 
transfer, lease, conveyance or disposition, that the Collective Election shall 
have been made with respect to such election). However, at and after the 
effective time of such transaction, (i)&nbsp;the Company will continue to have 
the right to determine the form of consideration to be paid or delivered, as the
case may be, upon conversion of the Securities, as set forth under 
<b>Section&nbsp;10.02</b> and (ii)(x)&nbsp;any amount payable in cash upon 
conversion of the Securities as set forth under <b>Section&nbsp;10.02</b> will 
continue to be payable in cash, (y)&nbsp;any Common Shares that the Company 
would have been required to deliver upon conversion of the Securities as set 
forth under <b>Section&nbsp;10.02</b> will instead be deliverable in the amount 
and type of Reference Property that a holder of that number of Common Shares 
would have received in such transaction and (z)&nbsp;the Daily VWAP of the 
Common Shares will be calculated based on the value of a unit of Reference 
Property that a holder of one of the Common Shares would have received in such 
transaction.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that the Company is the 
surviving party in a consolidation, amalgamation, statutory arrangement, merger 
or binding share exchange involving a third party, such supplemental indenture 
shall provide that the Reference Property to be provided for upon conversion, if
other than the Common Shares, would be payable by another party to the 
transaction; <i>provided</i> that the Company shall not enter into such 
transaction if as a result thereof Holders would be subject to a greater risk of
not receiving in full the Reference Property upon conversion. If holders of 
Common Shares shall have the opportunity to elect the form of consideration to 
be received pursuant to such reclassification, change, consolidation, 
amalgamation, statutory arrangement, merger, binding share exchange, sale, 
assignment, transfer, lease, conveyance or disposition, then the Reference 
Property will be deemed to be the weighted average of the types and amounts of
consideration received by the holders of Common Shares that affirmatively make 
such election (the &#147;<b>Collective Election</b>&#148;). The Company will 
notify the Holders of Securities, the Trustee and the Conversion Agent (if not 
the Trustee) of the Collective Election as soon as practical after such 
determination is made.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">72<a name="PB_72_224751_5335"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='72',FILE='C:\JMS\107541\16-16101-1\task8049706\16101-1-mo-
17.htm',USER='107541',CD='Aug  4 03:47 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the foregoing, if Holders 
would otherwise be entitled to receive, upon conversion of the Securities, any 
property (including cash) or securities that would not constitute 
&#147;prescribed securities&#148; for the purposes of clause 212(1)(b)(vii)
(E)&nbsp;of the Income Tax Act (Canada) as it applied on December&nbsp;31, 2015 
(such consideration, &#147;<b>Ineligible Consideration</b>&#148;), such Holders 
shall not be entitled to receive such Ineligible Consideration but the Company 
or the successor or acquirer, as the case may be, shall have the right (at the 
sole option of the Company or the successor or acquirer, as the case may be) to 
deliver to such Holders either such Ineligible Consideration or &#147;prescribed
securities&#148; for the purposes of clause 212(1)(b)(vii)(E)&nbsp;of the Income
Tax Act (Canada) as it applied on December&nbsp;31, 2007 with a market value (as
conclusively determined by the Board of Directors) equal to the market value of 
such Ineligible Consideration.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company shall give notice to the 
Holders at least thirty (30) calendar days prior to the effective date of any 
transaction set forth in this <b>Section&nbsp;10.11</b> in writing and by 
release to a business newswire stating the consideration into which the 
Securities will be convertible after the effective date of such transaction. 
After such notice, the Company or the successor or acquirer, as the case may be,
may not change the consideration to be delivered upon conversion of the Security
except in accordance with any other provision of this Indenture.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The supplemental 
indenture referred to in the first sentence of this <b>Section&nbsp;10.11</b> 
shall provide for adjustments of the Conversion Rate that shall be as nearly 
equivalent as may be practicable to the adjustments of the Conversion Rate 
provided for in this <b>Article</b></font><b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>X</b>. The foregoing, 
however, shall not in any way affect the right a Holder of a Security may 
otherwise have, pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;10.13</b>, to receive rights or 
warrants upon conversion of a Security. If, in the case of any such 
consolidation, amalgamation, statutory arrangement, merger, binding share 
exchange, sale, assignment, transfer, lease, conveyance or disposition, the 
stock or other securities and property (including cash) receivable thereupon by 
a holder of Common Shares includes shares of stock or other securities and 
property of a Person other than the successor or purchasing Person, as the case 
may be, in such consolidation, amalgamation, statutory arrangement, merger, 
binding share exchange, sale, assignment, transfer, lease, conveyance or
disposition, then such supplemental indenture shall also be executed by such 
other Person and shall contain such additional provisions to protect the 
interests of the Holders of the Securities as the Board of Directors in good 
faith shall reasonably determine necessary by reason of the foregoing (which 
determination shall be described in a Board Resolution). The provisions of this 
<b>Section</b><b><font size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.11</b> shall similarly apply to successive 
consolidations, amalgamations, statutory arrangements, mergers, binding share 
exchanges, sales, assignments, transfers, leases, conveyances or 
dispositions.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event the Company shall execute a 
supplemental indenture pursuant to this <b>Section&nbsp;10.11</b>, the Company 
shall promptly file with the Trustee an Officer&#146;s Certificate briefly 
stating the reasons therefor, the kind or amount of shares of stock or 
securities or property (including cash) receivable by Holders of the Securities 
upon the conversion of their Securities after any such reclassification, change,
consolidation, amalgamation, statutory arrangement, merger, binding share 
exchange, sale, assignment, transfer, lease, conveyance or disposition and any 
adjustment to be made with respect thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">73<a name="PB_73_224853_5796"></a></p>

align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company shall not become a party to any
such reclassification, change, consolidation, amalgamation, statutory 
arrangement, merger, binding share exchange, sale, assignment, transfer, lease, 
conveyance or disposition unless the terms thereof are consistent with this 
<b>Section&nbsp;10.11</b>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.12</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>TRUSTEE&#146;S DISCLAIMER</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Neither the Trustee 
nor the Conversion Agent has any duty to determine the Conversion Rate, when an 
adjustment under this <b>Article</b></font><b><font size="3" style="font-
size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>X</b> should be made, how it 
should be made or what such adjustment should be, but may accept as conclusive 
evidence of the correctness of any such adjustment, and shall be protected in 
relying upon, the Officer&#146;s Certificate with respect thereto which the 
Company is obligated to file with the Trustee pursuant to <b>Section</b><b><font
size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.09</b> hereof. Neither the Trustee nor the 
Conversion Agent makes any representation as to the validity or value of any 
securities or assets issued upon conversion of Securities, and neither the
Trustee nor the Conversion Agent shall be responsible for the failure by the 
Company to comply with any provisions of this <b>Article</b><b><font size="3" 
style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>X</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Trustee shall not 
be under any responsibility to determine the correctness of any provisions 
contained in any supplemental indenture executed pursuant to 
<b>Section</b></font><b><font size="3" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.11</b>, but may accept as conclusive 
evidence of the correctness thereof, and shall be protected in relying upon, the
Officer&#146;s Certificate with respect thereto which the Company is obligated 
to file with the Trustee pursuant to <b>Section</b><b><font size="3" 
style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b><b>10.11</b> 
hereof.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.13</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>RIGHTS DISTRIBUTIONS PURSUANT TO 
SHAREHOLDERS&#146; RIGHTS PLANS</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon conversion of any Security or a 
portion thereof, the Company shall make provision for the Holder thereof, to the
extent such Holder is entitled to receive Common Shares upon such conversion, to
receive, in addition to, and concurrently with the delivery of, the 
consideration otherwise payable hereunder upon such conversion, the rights 
described in any shareholders&#146; rights plan the Company may have in effect 
at such time, unless such rights have separated from the Common Shares at the 
time of such conversion, in which case the Conversion Rate shall be adjusted 
upon such separation in accordance with <b>Section&nbsp;10.05(C)</b>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.14</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>INCREASED CONVERSION RATE APPLICABLE TO 
CERTAIN SECURITIES SURRENDERED IN CONNECTION WITH MAKE-WHOLE FUNDAMENTAL 
CHANGES</b>.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(A)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding anything herein to the 
contrary, the Conversion Rate applicable to each Security that is surrendered 
for conversion, in accordance with this <b>Article&nbsp;X</b>, at any time 
during the period (the &#147;<b>Make-Whole Conversion Period</b>&#148;) that 
begins on, and includes, the Effective Date of a Make-Whole Fundamental Change 
and ends on, and includes, the date that is thirty-five (35) Business Days after
the actual Effective Date of such Make-Whole Fundamental Change (or, if such 
Make-Whole Fundamental Change also constitutes a Fundamental Change, the second 
scheduled trading day immediately preceding the Fundamental Change Purchase Date
applicable to such Fundamental Change) shall be increased to an amount equal to 
the Conversion Rate</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">74<a name="PB_74_224951_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='74',FILE='C:\JMS\107541\16-16101-1\task8049706\16101-1-mo-
17.htm',USER='107541',CD='Aug  4 03:47 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">that would, but for this <b>Section&nbsp;10.14</b>, 
otherwise apply to such Security pursuant to this <b>Article&nbsp;X</b>, plus an
amount equal to the Make-Whole Applicable Increase; <i>provided</i>, 
<i>however</i>, that such increase to the Conversion Rate shall not apply if 
such Make-Whole Fundamental Change is announced by the Company but not 
consummated.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The additional consideration deliverable or
payable hereunder on account of any Make-Whole Applicable Increase with respect 
to a Security surrendered for conversion is herein referred to as the 
&#147;<b>Make-Whole Consideration</b>.&#148;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(B)</font><font 
size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>As used herein, &#147;<b>Make-Whole 
Applicable Increase</b>&#148; shall mean, with respect to a Make-Whole 
Fundamental Change, the number of shares set forth in the following table, which
corresponds to the effective date of such Make-Whole Fundamental Change (the 
&#147;<b>Effective Date</b>&#148;) and the Applicable Price of such Make-Whole 
Fundamental Change:</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Number of additional 
shares</font></i></b><br> (per $1,000 principal amount of Securities)</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="14%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="84%" colspan="19" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-
bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:84.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">Applicable&nbsp;Price</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="14%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid 
windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Effective&nbsp;Date</font></b></p>    
</td>
<td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font
